name: Paris, France
description: The City of Light awaits with its iconic landmarks, world-class museums, and exquisite cuisine.

name: Bali, Indonesia
description: Tropical paradise with stunning beaches, lush rice terraces, and vibrant cultural traditions.

name: Swiss Alps, Switzerland
description: Majestic mountain ranges perfect for skiing, hiking, and experiencing breathtaking natural beauty.

name: Rome, Italy
description: Ancient history comes alive in the Eternal City with its iconic ruins and Renaissance art.

name: Santorini, Greece
description: Picturesque island with whitewashed buildings, blue-domed churches, and spectacular sunsets.

name: Kyoto, Japan
description: Traditional temples, beautiful gardens, and historic districts blend with modern city life.
